common.description: Use the tools below to manage the voting advice application.

factorAnalysis.title: Factor Analysis
factorAnalysis.description: Analyze and manage factors for the election questions.

compute.title: Compute factors
compute.description: Compute the latent factors from the answers given by candidates and parties.
compute.selectElections: Select the elections for which to compute the factors.

errors.genericError: An error occurred while trying to log in. Please try again.
errors.unauthorized: You need admin privileges to access this area
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired, please log in again

errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this area

questionInfo.title: Question Info Generation
questionInfo.description: Generate and manage information for election questions.
questionInfo.pageDescription: Generate or edit the background information for questions.

generate.title: Generate info
generate.description: Generate the information overwriting any infos generated earlier.
generate.questionType: Select questions to generate info for

edit.title: Edit infos
edit.description: Edit the existing information. You can either edit it directly using a JSON editor or download it as CSV and then upload the edited information.
edit.uploadButton: Upload the information you have edited as CSV

argumentCondensation.title: Argument Condensation
argumentCondensation.description: Condense and manage arguments for election questions.
